title: Disconnecting from games and losing LP!?! but works perfectly fine in normals and ranked teams??
body:
My past 3 games i've lost a total of 56lp because I would get into a rank game and suddenly it disconnects me and my skype account . So i've tried logging off my skype account and it still disconnects me and won't let me reconnect until after the game is over and after i lost... So i queue up into a normal and ranked team with my friends and it works perfectly fine but when i go into a normal ranked game it disconnects me and i lost lp that i should/shouldn't have lost depending on if i actually played or not which in this case not because I cant play. THIS IS EXTREMELY TILTING..

I get disconnected from my interent on legaue and skype but it works perfectly fine on my browsers?!?!

replies.body:
Since you're not only disconnecting from League, but also Skype, it sounds like you're experiencing an overall unstable connection. There are a number of potential factors that could be impacting your connection, but our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions. 

If you continue to disconnect after working through those steps, please let me know.

okay thanks i'll let you know if it works or not . 

Is there a possible way to gain the LP that i lost for my past 2 ranked games because it wasn't fair for me or my teammates.

and what should i look under at the connection guide to help fix my problem?

riot has also gave me a 5 game queue wait for 5 games now.. c'mon this isn't fair it isn't my fault :\ 56lp lost for no reason and now this

Unfortunately, we're not able to modify LP after it has been recorded. Once recorded by the server, results cannot be modified, as an effort to prevent abuse of the system. 

All disconnections are treated equally by the system because regardless of intent, each disconnection negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is also a key reason why any low priority penalties cannot be modified or removed. 

The connection guide in its entirety should be worked through to ensure you've tried all the most-known steps to fix the issue. Let me know if you have any additional questions.

So i just played a normal game and the game went perfectly fine.. and the moment i queue to a ranked i disconnected again and now i've offically dropped from gold 1 56lp to gold 2 75 :\ 

idk what to do anymore
Did you work through all the steps in the connection guide I linked you? If so, did you notice any changes?

nope i sitll get disconnected from games only in ranked

just a little update i was playing a normal game and it went fine for 18 min then right after that i just randomly disconnected ... how do i even play this game anymore?!?! i've redownloaded league i've turned off firewall or allowed league through it.. i basically did everything :\

Since you've worked through all the steps in the connection guide and seen no change, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists so they can investigate further. Run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), then attach the results with your [ticket submission.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any additional questions.

so i heard last night riot disabled ranked due to the complains that they were getting about rank disconnecting and all , do you think this might apply to me and what's been happening to me?

just went on smurf and still got same results

I don't think the service issues we had were impacting your issues over the span of days. That incident only happened for that one evening, and only a portion of that evening. Definitely reach out to our tech team with the steps I sent so we can work with you to resolve with for good.

Let me know if you have any questions.

so i went into a ranked game on my smurf and it worked perfectly fine.... then i went on my main and ranked and i get disconnected again!??! i've offically dropped from gold 1 56 lp to gold 2 57 lp with a 20 min leaver buster for 5 games. Tell me that is fair. i know you can't do anything once it's logged but can you at least remove the leaver buster? :\ 

i sent a ticket to riot support and they haven't responded yet

Even if it's caused by technical issues, disconnecting from a match negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a key reason why Leaverbuster treats all disconnections equally and why we cannot modify or remove its penalties. 

I recommend testing any changes that our tech specialists request in a custom match to avoid future Leaverbuster penalties until the issue is resolved.

custom , aram, and sometimes normals work perfectly fine. it's just rank that doesn't which confuses me :\ i haven't played league for 2 weeks and i think by now i should be plat if it wasn't for this situation.

it's been 3 days since i sent me ticket to the support, and they haven't opened it or said anything. do u know how long it will take for them to respond. because you're normally responding within a day but they took 3 days and i still haven't heard from them

Draft modes are a bit more sensitive to connection drops, as there are a lot more actions going on and actions the server and your client have to sync during champ select. 

Turnaround time for a ticket can vary depending on how many tickets are in that team's queue. I doubled checked and confirmed your ticket was submitted, so I recommend sitting tight while our tech team gets back to you as soon as they're available to.
okay thanks for everything , i'll let you know when i get the latest update
